channel.description: Reality television is our guilty pleasure. Join us live each week to get the latest run down on your favorite reality shows from the week. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

channel.itunes:subtitle: Reality Chick Chat

item.title: EPISODE 15 - Reality Chick Chat
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Tonight we discuss Mobwives Reunion Pt. 2 and say goodbye until next season. We will say hello to the new group of Mobwives from Chicago and see what we thought of the sneak peak episode that aired Sunday. We catch up with the ladies from RHOC, find out what's in store for next weeks RHONJ and more! Send feedback to realitychickchat@gmail.com
item.itunes:author: RealityChicks
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 15 - Reality Chick Chat

item.title: EPISODE 11 - RHONJ Breakdown
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Tonight we are devoting our entire podcast to the Real Housewives of New Jersey. Join us as we breakdown Episode 2 to discuss (and vent) what we think about season 4 so far.

item.title: EPISODE 10- Reality Chick Chat
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Join Rose & Melissa as they recap a variety of reality TV shows from the week. Tonight we will discuss what went down at the champagne bowling outing on Real Housewives of Orange County, confrontations and reunions on Shahs of Sunset, a pregnancy scare (or was it?) on Big Rich Texas, what we think of new shows like Dance Moms Miami and Mama's Boys Of The Bronx plus more!
item.itunes:author: RealityChicks
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE 10- Reality Chick Chat

item.title: EPISODE 5 - Reality Chick Chat
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: On the latest episode of Mobwives Drita & Ramona have Halloween parties on the same night, but who cares, all we want to see is Big Ang wig shopping! Less drama & more fun please! The ladies of RHOC have a totally bitchin' 80's bunco party! Things heat up as usual when Slade's Improv comedy routine is brought up. Plus recaps of Celebrity Apprentice, Dance Moms, Jerseylicious and Big Rich Texas!
item.itunes:author: RealityChicks

item.title: EPISODE 1 - Reality Chick Chat
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Join us as we recap and chat about the Real Housewives of Orange County Season 7 Premiere and the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills Season 2 three part reunion! Mob Wives was on break last Sunday so we'll get caught up on what's been happening and get ready for a new Mobwives Sunday 2/12!!
